definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly

sentences.english: We think Astro Soichi would have made a great roommate.
sentences.chinese: 我们觉得屋子里有宇航员野口聪一作伴一定其乐无穷。

sentences.english: Undulator oar, boating on the lake, Fun for all at.
sentences.chinese: 凌波荡桨，泛舟湖上，其乐无穷。

sentences.english: It's (It is) fun to visit the museum and its neighboring shopping malls.
sentences.chinese: 到博物馆及它的邻近购物中心旅游其乐无穷。

sentences.english: Well, there is an ice skating rink which is fun for everybody.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，那儿有个对每个人来说都其乐无穷的溜冰场。

sentences.english: Interacting with dream people is a lot of fun.
sentences.chinese: 和有梦想的人沟通其乐无穷。

sentences.english: Great scenery, all recorded by the share, is a very happy thing.
sentences.chinese: 大好河山，尽收相机，与众分享，其乐无穷。

sentences.english: And they are lots of fun to play with.
sentences.chinese: 跟它们在一起玩其乐无穷。

definition: lit. isn't that a joy? (quote from Confucius)/fig. (jocularly) extremely/awfully
to find amusement in one's own way/to enjoy oneself quietly
to enjoy sth and never tire of it (idiom)
to be evenly matched/to meet one's match
to find joy in sorrows (idiom); to enjoy sth in spite of one's suffering
to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
to talk of the past and discuss the present (idiom)/to chat freely/to discuss everything
to talk idly about important matters (idiom)/to set the world to rights/to pass judgment on everything
